name: Apus
description:
APUS

A puzzle game about an explorer that gets trapped in an ancient temple while trying to get a  powerful magic relic. The player will have to use the power of the relic, which allows you to move magic blocks, in order to escape the dangers of the temple and finally go back home safe and sound.

Controls:

WASD - move main character

Arrow keys - move magic blocks

R - restart

esc - pause

Made by:

roguetaver

Sir John William

sophiaks
